text: The Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles family just got a little bigger. David Parnes welcomed his first child, a girl, with wife Adrian Abnosi on Thursday, April 12. David proudly introduced his and Adrian's little girl to the world on Instagram on Thursday with the most adorable first photo of the newborn. ` ` My amazing wife @ adrianabnosi gave us the best gift in the world today. Meet our baby girl India. She ’ s the most beautiful, precious soul I have ever met,'' David gushed on Instagram. ` ` We can ’ t wait to spend every day with you. Thank you for lightening up our lives. We love you baby India.'' The MDLLA agent also shared his first sweet moments with his daughter in his In
